org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.plugins.util
Interface TypeConverter<T>

Type Parameters:
T - Converts Strings into the given type T.
All Known Implementing Classes:
TypeConverters.BigDecimalConverter, TypeConverters.BigIntegerConverter, TypeConverters.BooleanConverter, TypeConverters.ByteArrayConverter, TypeConverters.ByteConverter, TypeConverters.CharacterConverter, TypeConverters.CharArrayConverter, TypeConverters.CharsetConverter, TypeConverters.ClassConverter, TypeConverters.DoubleConverter, TypeConverters.EnumConverter, TypeConverters.FileConverter, TypeConverters.FloatConverter, TypeConverters.IntegerConverter, TypeConverters.LevelConverter, TypeConverters.LongConverter, TypeConverters.PatternConverter, TypeConverters.SecurityProviderConverter, TypeConverters.ShortConverter, TypeConverters.StringConverter, TypeConverters.UriConverter, TypeConverters.UrlConverter
public interface TypeConverter<T>

Interface for doing automatic String conversion to a specific type.

Method Summary
 T convert(String s)
          Converts a String to a given type.
 

Method Detail

convert

T convert(String s)
          throws Exception
Converts a String to a given type.

Parameters:
s - the String to convert. Cannot be null.
Returns:
the converted object.
Throws:
Exception - thrown when a conversion error occurs
